entry.title: Heat Sick
entry.summary:
Author: ao3enchantress

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 706Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: Stiles doesn’t mean to forget things. But when the pharmacy was out of his ADHD meds, and told him to come back in three days, he… didn’t. He forgot. Twice. Derek noticed — of course he noticed — and ended up picking them up himself. Restarting the meds solved one problem but caused another. Appetite gone, hydration forgotten, routine shot, Stiles drifted into his upcoming heat without the supplements, nutrition, or stability an omega needs to ride it out safely. He didn’t know he was running on empty …until the heat ended, and his body crashed. Heat sickness is rare — a dangerous post‑heat complication where a depleted omega’s hormones fail to regulate. Fever. Muscle pain. Emotional collapse. Bond instability. Nonverbal regression. The body tries to finish the heat alone, even after it’s over — and it hurts. For six days, Stiles is barely aware of anything except pain, instinct, and the overwhelming need for his alpha.

entry.title: When the Moon Rises (We Fall Apart)
entry.summary:
Author: AnomeeChan

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,561Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 9

Summary: Stiles figures out Scott's a werewolf, but Scott refuses to listen. With the full moon approaching and Scott too focused on first line and Allison to care about control, Stiles goes looking for answers on his own. A late-night trip to the Hale house gets him chased by the Alpha and saved by Derek Hale, who's not the monster Scott thinks he is. As their friendship fractures over Scott's anger and denial, Stiles finds himself caught between his best friend pushing him away and a werewolf who keeps showing up when it matters. Derek returns Stiles' phone, talks him down from dark thoughts, trains him to survive, and proves he's trying to help. But Scott, convinced Derek is the killer, frames him for his sister's murder. Trust shifts. Lines blur. With the full moon and Scott's first game colliding at Lydia's party, Stiles has to choose between the best friend who won't listen and the werewolf who keeps saving his life. Because if Scott's alive, that's better than dead, even if it means standing on Derek's side before either of them is ready to admit what that means

entry.title: The Pumpkin Plan - Derek's way to woo a Stiles
entry.summary:
Author: Karla_Kattz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,065Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 54

Summary: Stiles currently has no kitchen, while Derek does. Stiles can't prepare himself proper, nutritious meals, but Derek can.Derek thinks of Stiles and feels the need to keep him healthy. After all, he is a responsible landlord—and an alpha. It's in an alpha's nature to provide.A plan quickly forms in Derek's head. Now, all he needs is a pumpkin. And Tupperware. --- Derek Hale dislikes people, but his new neighbor Stiles is the exception to this rule. Instead of flirting with Stiles and asking him out like a typical guy would, Derek devises his own unique method of courting. It involves pumpkins and an apron, and nothing can go wrong. Or can it?

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,855Chapters: 15/15Kudos: 241

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: The Loquacious Fingers
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,483Chapters: 6/11Kudos: 110

Summary: Derek Hale didn’t expect getting lost in his own neighborhood to change anything—until the night he frightened a stranger in a dark alley without meaning to. Stiles Stilinski is deaf, skittish, stubborn, all sharp eyes and quiet panic, a notebook clutched to his chest, and a silence Derek doesn’t understand until much later. Soon Stiles is stepping into Derek’s messy loft, borrowing his books, drinking his tea, and filling Derek’s quiet spaces with the warm, steady presence Derek didn’t know he needed. Things begin to get tricky when Derek realizes that his erotic stories more and more star Stiles instead of the usual sexy female heroine. But everything's under control until one day, Stiles is curled on Derek’s couch reading the manuscript he never intended anyone to see. Derek isn’t sure what terrifies him more: getting lost in the dark with no one to help him or Stiles recognizing the pieces of himself hidden in the pages.

entry.title: A Tether in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: ReadNowSleepLater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,677Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 129

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never meant to become a myth. After the fall of his pack and the fading of Beacon Hills’ magic, he runs – straight into a world older, darker, and far more complicated than he ever imagined. Mystic Falls is supposed to be a quiet place to start over, to ground himself again. Instead, it becomes the center of a storm he didn’t know was waiting for him. Drawn into the tangled lives of the Mikaelsons, Stiles finds unexpected warmth among immortals who should’ve terrified him – and something dangerously close to belonging. Between Elijah’s steady grace, Kol’s mischief, Klaus’ possessive charm, and Peter’s return from the shadows, he starts to build something new: a family stitched together by chaos, magic, and a kind of love that defies logic. But magic never lets go without a fight, and neither do old bonds. When ghosts from his past and creatures from the dark rise to claim him, Stiles has to face what it truly means to be an anchor – and what, and who, he’s willing to tether himself to. Because in the end, even in the dark, someone always reaches back.

entry.title: Mine in the Middle of Beacon Hills
entry.summary:
Author: TheRomanceKing

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 838Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 32

Summary: Derek and Stiles have been quietly dating for a few weeks, keeping their relationship a secret while navigating pack dynamics and high school life. At a local coffee shop, someone flirts with Stiles openly. Derek sees it. Derek feels that familiar twist of protective jealousy. He kisses Stiles in the softest, most romantic way possible, leaving no doubt about whose alpha he belongs to.
